name: class
title: Class Selector (".class")
desc: Selects all elements with the given class.

argument.desc: A class to search for. An element can have multiple classes; only one of them must match.
argument.name: class

examples.desc: Finds the element with the class "myClass".
examples.html:
div class="notMe"
div class="myClass"
span class="myClass"

examples.desc: Finds the element with both "myclass" and "otherclass" classes.
examples.html:
div class="notMe"
div class="myClass"
span class="myClass"

entries.longdesc: For class selectors, jQuery uses JavaScript's native getElementsByClassName() function if the browser supports it.
